about_the_game:
Set in an Apocalyptic World, you play as a renegade with incredible endurance and speed, demolishing enemies with arcade like weapons.
TileDynasty is an FPS Arena, where Players can work together against AI Enemies or go head-to-head accomplishing objectives within each game mode.


WEAPONS
    GRENADE LAUNCHER
    RIFLE
    MACHINE GUN
    ROCKET LAUNCHER
    PORTER GUN

MOVEMENT: Designed for fluid-like motion, coupled with Wall Movement, use multiple approaches to get to different platforms to your strategy!

LEVELS: Maps will be designed to tailor to the 'Arcade-Feel' of the game

CURRENT MODES:
    SEARCH AND RESCUE: Locate the hostages in each map and escort them back to the rescue zone, and defend the hostages from the enemy

    TEAM DEATH MATCH: Head-To-Head online with friends or against AI

Set in an Apocalyptic World, you play as a renegade with incredible endurance and speed, demolishing enemies with arcade like weapons.
TileDynasty is an FPS Arena, where Players can work together against AI Enemies or go head-to-head accomplishing objectives within each game mode.


WEAPONS
    GRENADE LAUNCHER
    RIFLE
    MACHINE GUN

    PORTER GUN

MOVEMENT: Designed for fluid-like motion, coupled with Wall Movement, use multiple approaches to get to different platforms to your strategy!

LEVELS: Maps will be designed to tailor to the 'Arcade-Feel' of the game

CURRENT MODES:
    SEARCH AND RESCUE: Locate the hostages in each map and escort them back to the rescue zone, and defend the hostages from the enemy

    TEAM DEATH MATCH: Head-To-Head online with friends or against AI

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.8
  • Processor: Intel i5 Processor 2.4 GHz Dual Core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Video card supporting shader model 3.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.8+
  • Processor: Intel i7 Processor 2.4 GHz+ Quad Core
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Video card supporting shader model 3.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

name: TileDynasty FPS Arena

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or later
  • Processor: Intel i5 Processor 2.4 GHz Dual Core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Video card supporting shader model 3.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:

  • Processor: Intel i7 Processor 2.4 GHz+ Quad Core
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Video card supporting shader model 3.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Looking to bring the old arcade-game feeling back from nostalgia. Bunny hopping is taken to the next level with smooth movement, allowing you to navigate fluidly through the maps, while defeating your opponents!
